survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Plant-Based Restaurant Menu Options Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding plant-based menu options at restaurants to help improve offerings and customer experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you choose plant-based menu options when dining out?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency to capture nuanced behavior. Ensure options are evenly spaced for balanced data.

script.question_text: How frequently do you choose plant-based menu options when dining out?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of plant-based menu items? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand key drivers. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plant-based options currently available at restaurants?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point satisfaction scale. Include a neutral option for balanced responses.
